item.description:
Hello everyone!! Hope all of you are doing well. Velvet and I missed seeing you in August and September. Now that things have settled down, we're ready to get back to the meetups.

This month's meet up will be on Sunday, October 17th from 11am to 1pm. We will have a Halloween Celebration, so bring those puggies in costumes. We'll have a prize for the best costume and see if anyone wants to bob for apples this year (not too many puggies were interested in getting wet for apples last year!!).

If anyone would like to schedule a grooming for after the meeting, please let me know ahead of time so I can be sure my groomer is here.

Anyone attending for the first time, please check in at the front desk and be sure to bring proof of updated vaccines for the rabies, distemper and canine cough.

As always, if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Looking forward to seeing you all!!

Agni
781.245.1237
item.name: OCTOBER MEET UP - HALLOWEEN CELEBRATION
